Load packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(caret)
```

```{r}
set.seed(2022)

# import and tidy
data = read_csv("./College.csv") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  select(-college)

# partition data into training and testing sets into randomized 4:1 splits
train_index = createDataPartition(y = data$outstate, p = 0.8, list = FALSE)
train_data = data[train_index, ]
test_data = data[-train_index, ]

# matrices of predictors 
train_pred = model.matrix(outstate ~ ., train_data)[ ,-1]
test_pred = model.matrix(outstate ~ ., test_data)[ ,-1]

# vectors of response
train_resp = train_data$outstate
test_resp = test_data$outstate
```
